entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early this morning. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
